mapper.update: update seo set seo_title = #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_keywords = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_type = #{seoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_asid = #{seoAsid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where seo_id = #{seoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select seo_id, seo_title, seo_description, seo_keywords, seo_type, seo_asid from seo
select seo_id, seo_title, seo_description, seo_keywords, seo_type, seo_asid from seo
